summary: adds sleeves to steel armor and nordic steel banded armor
descriptionHtml:
update 1.2 fixes texture paths. sorry to those who had problems
update. version 1.01 fixes the female clip issue

Have you ever wondered why no one wears sleeves in the northernmost province of tamriel?
I have. In fact, i\'d say it is downright ludicrous and immersion shattering.
i live in New Jersey. Its certainly not a nordic climate but during fall and winter its cold and you need not only long sleeves, but hoodies and coats and even hats sometimes.
Obviously it was a stylistic choice and i think an unfortunate one. Imagine if they went to town crafting armours and clothes that were warm and kept the denizens of skyrim bundled up. It would certainly add to immersion and give skyrim its own unique personality.
I have long sought to rectify this situation and as i learn more about modding i can fix armours and create new ones that fit the climate of skyrim.
Here is steel armour. a plugin-less replacer.

The steel armour is simply with sleeves added however the banded steel has more additions than just sleeves. it is sleeves added to nordic steel armour from THusky\'s morrowind armour\'s mod.

It is compatible with retextures. it is for now only working on vanilla bodies so if you use big boobs replacers you will notice the boobs shrink when you put on this armor

I have included a picture with the heaviest female size, there is some clipping on bicep area. i am working on that but for medium and smaller females this isnt an issue (resolved)
author: Franklin Zunge
